Class Animal

java.lang.Object
Organisme
Animal
Direct Known Subclasses:
Aranya, Barb, Bear, Dufi, Gollum, Llobarro, Llop, PeixGlobus, Pollo, Rata, Snake, Xai, Yeti
public abstract class Animal extends Organisme
Animal representa que un organisme és de tipus Animal
Author:
Sergi Canals Ortega u1972852, Josep Maria Pou Comerma u1972857
